comment._content: "The Rt Hon. Frederick Edwin Smith, 1st Earl of Birkenhead, GCSI, PC, KC (12 July 1872 – 30 September 1930), best known to history as F. E. Smith, was a British Conservative statesman and lawyer." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/F._E._Smith,_1st_Earl_of_Birkenhead He was Solicitor General from 2 June 1915 to 8 November 1915 (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solicitor_General_for_England_and_W...)
